skins.shipDescription: Conte di Cavour-class battleship ¨C Conte di Cavour.
skins.selfIntroduction: I witnessed the ascendancy of the Imperial Fleet as well as its decay into powerlessness. Commander, I pray that you, as the leader of the fleet, will never repeat the tragedies of the past.
skins.acquisition: I am the dreadnought, Conte di Cavour. There is much that I can do for you, Commander, but that depends on whether or not you are trustworthy.
skins.login: Save your breath. Let's begin today's work.
skins.details: Leonardo da Vinci... had that tragedy not occurred, she surely would've fought to the last breath for the glory of the Sardegna Empire, just like Cesare.
skins.secretaryIdle1: A gown? I have no interest in things like that. Nor will I ever.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if I ever get invited to one of those Royal tea parties, please tell them that I am too busy with secretary work.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Some people used to hold me to lofty expectations, but it feels natural to see the next generation surpass me.
skins.secretaryTouch: Allow me to say this: judging people by their appearance will be your downfall.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Just how little do you think of me?
